issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Alloy
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the Alloy here.

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
I am trying to add events to the calendar but for android 6 its not working i added the permissions also in tiapp.xml its asking me to allow permissions for the app but giving WARNING: calendar permissions are missing. Please suggest me solution I would be grateful.
Thank you.
fields.summary: calendar is not working for android 6
fields.environment: titanium SDK 5.2.2, windows 7 OS, android 6 device for testing

comments.body:
Hello, try setting the calnder permission as 
{code}
<manifest>
    <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_CALENDAR"/>
</manifest>
{code}

This works. I have tested it with SDK 5.5.1.GA. Thanks.
